arts.ttl: Serie A | Parma 1-3 Lecce: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Serie A encounter, Lecce showcased their resilience and attacking prowess to secure a crucial 3-1 away victory against Parma at the Ennio Tardini stadium. The match saw Lecce overturn an early deficit to claim three vital points in their battle for survival in Italy's top flight.
